snippet: The director’s early 19th-century mansion on the Hudson is where, for 40 years, he and his longtime friends and collaborators gathered to feast, drink, argue and make movie magic. At 87, he’s still creating beauty.
abstract: James Ivory's early 19th-century mansion in New York's Hudson Valley, where he has lived for 40 years and ran his film company with partner Ismail Merchant, features classical fixtures and designs that highlight his love for the past.
lead_paragraph: The director’s early 19th-century mansion on the Hudson is where, for 40 years, he and his longtime friends and collaborators gathered to feast, drink, argue and make movie magic. At 87, he’s still creating beauty.

headline.main: James Ivory’s Home Befits His Extraordinary Life
